text: Thanks! (This is a personal pet rock of mine — I’m pushing the team to have consistent foldering/organization across the platform).

I submitted an idea for the ability to add custom CSS classes to CTA <a> elements in HubL/custom modules: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-add-CSS-Classes-to-CTA-lt-a-gt-element-from-HubL/idi-p/328521#M53760>
